dc_title_s: The Kingdome of Persia : with the cheef citties and habites described
dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale [1:9,000,000] (E 45째--E 73째/N 49째--N 20째). Relief shown pictorially. Includes views of Spaha, Ormus, Tarvis and Gilan. Includes depictions of social classes and styles of dress.|34 x 44 centimeters|Scale [1:9,000,000]|Ames Library of South Asia Maps
